title: Ouji to Majou to Himegimi to 1
description: Ooji Subaru transfers from an all-girls school to a co-ed school so that she won't be away from her father. She has had recurring dreams of a beautiful and gentle princess, but she believes that this is because of her admiration of princesses. Upon entering her new school, she encounters three guys -plus her childhood friend- who claim to be...?!
author: Kou Matsuzuki
